abstract: Tells the delegate when a scrolling animation in the scroll view concludes.
overview:
## Discussion

The scroll view calls this method at the end of its implementations of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIScrollView/setContentOffset(_:animated:)] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIScrollView/scrollRectToVisible(_:animated:)] methods, but only if animations are requested.

# scrollViewDidEndScrollingAnimation(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate when a scrolling animation in the scroll view concludes.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func scrollViewDidEndScrollingAnimation(_ scrollView: UIScrollView)
```

## Parameters

- **scrollView**: The scroll-view object thatâ€™s performing the scrolling animation.

## Discussion

The scroll view calls this method at the end of its implementations of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIScrollView/setContentOffset(_:animated:)] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIScrollView/scrollRectToVisible(_:animated:)] methods, but only if animations are requested.
title: scrollViewDidEndScrollingAnimation(_:)
